description:
Working as an editor at Amen Media for the past year, I had the opportunity to create a 3D set for the medium.

Workflow
- Asset design with SketchUp Pro 2019, Blender 4.1, or from Quixel Megascans or Poly Haven.
- Rendering with Cycles engine
- Post-production with DaVinci Resolve 18

PC configuration
- 16 GB DDR5
- Intel Core i7-12700H
- NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU
